EmailTemplate.subject: Best of S3 International: Upgrades That'll Keep You Mission Ready
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Best of S3 International brings you the 10 Air Turbine Starter (ATS) upgrade for the Blackhawk Did you know that virtually all technological advances in ATS Systems have been pioneered by Honeywell? Honeywell developed an ATS configuration that incorporated numerous design and material changes that increases the starter’s Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) to greater than 4000 hours.
Today, S3 International has partnered with Honeywell to bring you the UH-60 ATS Upgrade, which offers:
- ATS reliability MTBF >4000 hours - Quick Drain Oil Valve - Reduced maintenance man hours - Drop-in replacement - 5x more reliable - Up to 14% increased light-off torque
Plus, you can count on S3 International’s dedication to customized inventory that can be earmarked per customer. In addition to ensuring mitigated lead-times, spares and logistics management, S3 International also delivers competitive pricing guaranteed at Honeywell quality.
Contact S3 International about the UH-60 upgrade and keep your fleet mission ready.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/S3-UH60.html?utm_medium=Email&utm_source=Email&utm_campaign=18_channelamericas_D&S]]>
Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWmpnd1pETmhZV1JqWkRjeiIsInQiOiJTTXFTWVhFdE1LWnhqZk1oQkFmcVpSdWxJZFd4eVJDU3NUQ2VodFJHY3d4emYyeTg5M0pTK210ZDhcL2JGcmtmYXk4WEcrSjdOTHh4aWRHZXZQRExFR2c9PSJ9]]> to subscribe to our email communications.
